hadiths.text: Narrated Awf ibn Malik: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) entered upon us in the mosque, and he had a stick in his hand. A man hung there a bunch of hashaf. He struck the bunch with the stick, and said: If the owner of this sadaqah (alms) wishes to give a better one than it, he would give. The owner of this sadaqah will eat hashaf on the Day of Judgment

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لاَ يَجُوزُ مِنَ الثَّمَرَةِ فِي الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Which Fruits Are Not To be Accepted As Zakat
